ISSUE.TITLE: Do not assign numbers to drafts
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: `Proformas` and `Invoices` should not get numbers when they are saved in `draft` state. Instead they should get number and series when they are issued (of course, if they don't have a manually assigned ones).
